== Mobile bug workflow ==

In general, the workflow for Mobile bugs is the same as for regular bugs (<nowiki>[[/Bugs/WorkFlow]]</nowiki>)

In addition, bugs which affect mobile should

* Be tagged with the `ume` tag
* Have `ubuntu-mobile` subscribed to the bug.
